evidence.source_document: Amended Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief
evidence.text: AMENDED COMPLAINT FOR INJUNCTIVE AND DECLARATORY RELIEF

evidence.source_document: Amended Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs seek relief from this Court. The Court should vacate NEH's arbitrary and capricious and unlawful grant termination and partial rescission decisions; order the NEH to undertake the grant-application review process as the law requires; order NEH to follow the instructions provided in Congressional appropriations concerning the Federal/State program...
